attributes.action: Open unused military camps to ease preassure on hosital beds for coronavirus
attributes.additional_details: The goverment should consider this due to the pure scale of the infected or to be infected and would relieve pressure on hospitals and free up beds
attributes.background: Have the goverment or parliment open unused military bases and use them as temporary hospitals for people who have serious cases of coronavirus which would free up hospital beds for people with other illnesses

rejection.details: Since you started this petition, the Government has announced a number of temporary hospitals. Decisions on the location of these are clincial decisions based on need and availabilty of space.
